original_text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it: and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it.
korean_text: 누구든지 제 목숨을 구원하고자 하면 잃을 것이요 누구든지 나를 위하여 제 목숨을 잃으면 찾으리라

sentences.original_text: For whosoever will save his life
and whosoever will lose his life for my sake
sentences.korean_translation: 누구든지 나를 인하여 자기 목숨을 잃는 자는
